title: WTB: T206 Red Ames (Hands At Chest) & Ames (Hands Above Head) - SGC50+
author: pgellis

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Red Ames (Hands At Chest) & Ames (Hands Above Head) - SGC50+
posts.post_content: Looking to purchase Red Ames (Hands At Chest) and Red Ames (Hands Above Head).  Purchasing only SGC50 or better.  No PSA please.  Thank you.

Two week bump.

Boy these two cards have been tough.  Any out there in SGC50 or better?

5 Month Bump.

Still having trouble finding these 2 cards in SGC50 or better.  Anybody help out there?

Thanks,
Phil

7 month bump.  Red Ames where are you?

Thanks for your consideration,
Phil
